                                    <span class="ml-2">Visto</span>
                                </button>
                                <a class="btn btn-primary"
                                   href="https://betteranime.net/anime/legendado/let-s-play-quest-darake-no-my-life/episodio-05"
                                   role="button" title="Let&#039;s Play: Quest-darake no My Life - Episódio 05">
                                    <i class="fas fa-play"></i><span class="ml-2">Assistir</span>
                                </a>

                                   href="https://betteranime.net/anime/legendado/let-s-play-quest-darake-no-my-life/episodio-05/download"

                            </div>
                        </li>
                    <!--[if ENDBLOCK]><![endif]-->

afterAlertInteraction(e){if(e.confirmed)return"self"===e.onConfirmed.component?void Livewire.find(e.onConfirmed.id).dispatchSelf(e.onConfirmed.listener,e.result):void </script>

<script>
    // TOOLTIP :D
    $(function () {
        $('[data-toggle="tooltip"]').tooltip()
    });

    function isEmpty(str) {
        return (!str || str.length === 0 );
    }

        function changePlayerResolution(quality) {
                let qualityString = [];
                        qualityString["480p"] = "bWIq5xEBeNmMaHKCa/0SIDdDMw0nSqz1Dn57heKly+3yN88oJMk2ZOZiKltddYkScsCElkDn3I6CSI3T14df8iWZV1Ca6LZbnyV2hlDEQWjSk9sJMc4=";
                                qualityString["720p"] = "bWIq5xEBeNmMaHKCa/0SIDdDMw0nSqz1Dn57heKly/byN88oJMk2ZOZiKltddYkScsCElkDn3I6CSI3T14df8iWZV1Ca6LZbnyV2hlDEQWjSk9sJMc4=";
                                qualityString["1080p"] = "bWIq5xEBeNmMaHKCa/0SIDdDMw0nSqz1Dn57heKly/jjeY9CCZtFJ+t2B19KYtlNI4eTglPr3Y6BQ4DT14BW/juPAgrGo6FGnG4+0hTQSGzckdAPOYcZ7Skr";
                                                const url="https://betteranime.net/changePlayer",info=qualityString[quality];$.ajax({method:"POST",data:{_token:"XxAcW8xwUYNM0JvF7Ba7qmJVyD80zdEJTkRblmwk",info:info},url:url}).done(function(t){document.getElementById("playerFrame").src=t.frameLink,$("#qualitiesColumn button.active").removeClass("active"),$(`#quality${quality}`).addClass("active")});
    }
</script>
